duties_responsibilities.duty: Learn and apply CADD software including Bentley MicroStation.
Develop 3D corridor models and produce plan sheets.
Conduct production on civil engineering plan sets - cutting discipline sheets, applying look and feel symbology, annotations, scale, and print settings.
Organize and plan CADD drawings based on the needs of the clients CAD guidelines and standards.
Driven to achieve a quality and clean set of drawing products.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree and completed previous CADD courses as part of the curriculum.
